Headline: Midway-bound Orange & 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange & 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange & 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
